infotexts.loadingscreentip: Abnormalities are graded based on their risk level: ZAYIN, TETH, HE, WAW, and ALEPH.
Abnormalities can drop EGO Gifts, items which are infused with their essence and willpower. These gifts often have powerful abilities and should be exploited.
Behold the Abnormalities. Don't lose your Sanity.
Face the Fear, Build the Future.
Blubbering Toad "Glupo" is a ZAYIN grade Abnormality. Rather than croak, it makes crying noises. If appeased, it will occasionally drop Melty Eyes that cure insanity.
Croohoo, croohoo.
Don't Touch Me is a ZAYIN grade Abnormality which takes the form of a button. When pressed, it [REDACTED].
You've been pressing it numerous times and you still have something you want to know about it?
One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds is a ZAYIN grade Abnormality. This floating skull, if appeased, is capable of healing the entire crew's sanity.
It feeds on the evil that seeps out during conversations between people.
Punishing Bird is a TETH grade Abnormality. It is typically harmless and beneficial, but if enraged it will become indiscriminate and lethal.
People have been committing sins since long ago. Why do they commit sins, knowing it's wrong?
Forsaken Murderer is a TETH grade Abnormality. This criminally insane prisoner should be treated with caution, lest it escape its cell and go on a rampage.
What's really pitiful is people like you dying to the likes of me.
So That No One Will Cry is a TETH-grade Abnormality. This large wooden doll is covered in talismans which allow it to inflict Rupture with each hit.
You hear the quiet flickering of candles. In this cramped room, you find a wooden doll, standing. Are the talismans filling the room for a wish? Does this wooden doll wish for anything?
Proceeding Inquisitor and Everything There of an Inquisitor are TETH grade corrosions. They are created as a result of using Nothing There's EGO and corroding.
The Ordeal of Amber Dawn is a TETH-grade Ordeal. It can sometimes be found in outposts.
KQE-1J-23 is a HE grade abnormality. Its health may be relatively low, but fighting it alone is a death sentence due to its Captivity ability.
Der Freischütz is a HE grade abnormality. This bloodthirsty mercenary can be hired, for a cost.
This magical bullet can truly hit anyone, just like you say.
Headless Ichthys is a HE grade abnormality. Its size makes it easy to trap it in tight corridors, but its blood jet ability is extremely lethal.

The Naked Nest is a WAW grade Abnormality. This nest of parasites is not very dangerous in and of itself, but the parasites its spawns have fatal infectious bites. The nest and its worms are weak to fire.
It can enter your body through any aperture.
The only way to cure Exuviae Infection is with Broad-Spectrum Antibiotics, so keep some around.
Wayward Passenger is a HE-grade Abnormality. Its dimensional blades can inflict Rupture, allowing it to deal escalating damage against its foes. Beware of its High Speed Rip Space.
You see a poor passenger, stranded between dimensions. Most will never realize that this person ever disappeared.
The Ordeal of Amber Dusk is a WAW-grade Ordeal. These larger worms can spawn smaller worms intermittently, so kill them before they get too numerous.
Spiral of Contempt is a WAW-grade Abnormality. Spiral of Contempt is a mass of twisted gold branches roughly in the shape of a person.
Worthless wretch, your worth is not enough to even lay a finger on me.
Nothing There is an ALEPH grade abnormality. This towering monster is constantly trying to mimic humans, and as it was met with violence, it mimics violence.
And the many shells cried out one word, "Captain."
Blue Star is an ALEPH grade abnormality. Barely comprehensible, this creature does not seem to show any emotion towards those it harms.
Let us meet again as stars.
CENSORED is an ALEPH grade abnormality. Its true form is so horrid, it must be censored to prevent immediate insanity.
If a flaw in the system disables the censors covering the Abnormality, we will once again have to sincerely consider how to dispose of the captain.
Melty Eyes are consumables that heal sanity and deliriumine poisoning.
Penitence is a crown of thorns that grants the wearer Vigor.
Regret is a potent blunt force weapon which also slows the target down considerably.
Corroded Inquisitor equipment can be salvaged from fallen Inquisitors and freely used.
Sunshower is a plush sleeping fox holding an umbrella. As its parent Abnormality is practically nonexistent under Europa's oceans, it is a very rare and valuable find.
Pinpoint Logic Circuit is a seemingly perfect version of an FPGA circuit which can interface with organic brains.
Fluid Sac is not only a potent blunt force weapon, it also heals the user on hit. The only drawback is requiring blood.
Mimicry is a weaponized blade from Nothing There's arm. It is very effective in close quarters.

"These chains represent solidarity and connection. Together, we who are bound by the same chain bear the responsibilities hand in hand. We will face our destinies and share the weight together. We have no need to remove these chains. We have no means to remove these chains. And we have no need for those who intend to remove these chains."
"Many things are written in the Book of Vengeance, from instructions for avenging a Brother's death to instructions for avenging getting our foot stepped on in the streets."
"Little mistakes may occur within a family. It is my little joy to sweep such mistakes under the rug. I have been taught that is true loyalty."
"Us junior Brothers do not concern ourselves with seniority amongst ourselves. It is a detail of very little significance. All we wish to do is support each other and our senior Brothers, no more."
"The Middle always pays their debts. There are no 'little mistakes,' unless the mistake is from one of us."
W Corp denies all involvement with the existence of Wayward Passenger and claim its appearance is merely a coincidence.

W Corp, or WARP Corp, is responsible for the advent of experimental teleportation technology. Although it's best used sparingly to avoid side effects, it can significantly shorten return trips to the submarine. All you need is a WARP Teleportation Anchor and a WARP Recall Device.

R Corp Fourth Pack's Rabbit Team is known for its high agility and aggressive tactics. Their portable coilguns can pack one of three different ammo types; standard, piercing, and explosive. Their suits provide a degree of protection against pressure and low oxygen, allowing them to operate anywhere on Europa with impunity and largely ignore the threat of breaches.

R Corp Fourth Pack's Rhino Team specializes in demolition and heavy weapons. These power armor clad behemoths tear down everything in their way with impunity, and if the huge metal suit wasn't intimidating enough, they can move much, much faster than you'd expect.
That's that, and this is this.

The Kurokumo Clan is notable for its focus on swordplay, and is recognizable by their extensive augmentation tattoos, which depict the black clouds they are named after. Their main form of revenue is extortion, such as requiring tolls for passage between territories, or payments from Nest citizens in exchange for "protection".
The Kurokumo Clan is one of the twenty subsidiaries of The Thumb.

Like many other Syndicates, the Kurokumo Clan presents a strict hierarchy: at its head is the Patriarch (組長, Kumichō), under which are his Captains (頭, Kashira), which command groups composed of their henchmen, or Wakashu (若衆, Wakashū). At the death of a Captain, the next Captain will inherit their team, as well as the Captain's sword, the Kokuuntō.

The Patriarch of the Kurokumo Clan is a famed swordsman, who used to be numbered among the Ten Blades of the East. The Patriarch lost his claim to the title: following Captain Sayo's team's failure to complete a mission on behalf of the Thumb, his left hand was cut off, severely hindering his swordplay.

The Blade Lineage hail from District 19, the territory of S Corp. According to Aeng-du, the faction left in search of a better home due to the instability and corruption in the district, spreading out throughout the City. This resulted in much conflict, since most other areas in the City were already controlled by other Syndicates and factions.

Similar to the other four Fingers, the Thumb has a unique Syndicate culture and creed that all members follow fervently. Compared to the other Fingers, the Thumb is considered the most refined of the four. However, they are as refined as they are strict; any action that breaks their established hierarchy will meet immediate punishment, and anyone related to those related to the rule breaker wind up punished as well.

Soldatos of the eastern branch of the Thumb use a different weapon than those of the southern branch. Instead of a functioning musket with a bayonet attached, their firearm has been heavily modified to fully serve as a melee weapon; the barrel of their musket now ends with a blade, and features a retractible propeller on their top, which make use of their ammunition to boost the speed and force of their attacks. Additionally, their weapon possesses a cylinder much like a revolver's, where their ammunition is stored.
infotexts.character.onesin: One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds
infotexts.character.talisman: So That No One Will Cry
infotexts.entitydescription.mimicry: The yearning to imitate the human form is sloppily reflected on the E.G.O, as if it were a reminder that it should remain a mere desire. When the unfamiliar and otherworldly eyes stare at you, you will feel a chill up your spine. If pushed to the limit, one can wield it. It can deliver a powerful downswing that should be impossible for a human.
infotexts.entitydescription.protomimicry: Although it has less raw power than a typical copy of Mimicry, a sufficiently skilled wielder can still become legendary with this blade in hand.
infotexts.entitydescription.nothingthereegg: This egg is made of what looks like human flesh. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Nothing There.
infotexts.entitydescription.forcednothingthereegg: This strange egg seems to be composed entirely of human flesh.
infotexts.entitydescription.glupoegg: Croohoo, croohoo. If this egg is not contained, it will eventually hatch into a Blubbering Toad.
infotexts.entitydescription.meltyeye: A strange melty eye dropped by the Blubbering Toad. With proper medical skill it can act as a potent antipsychotic. When used improperly it can cause insanity.
infotexts.entitydescription.penitence: Despite being thorny, this crown is painless to wear. In fact, it strengthens the wearer.
infotexts.entitydescription.fluidsac: This battle will conclude in victory.
infotexts.entitydescription.forsakenmurdererstraig: This straight-jacket is not nearly enough to hold my violence back.
infotexts.entitydescription.regret: Enemies crushed by this regret can never return to their normal life.
infotexts.entitydescription.derfreischutz: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent. Seven damages reduced to 70%.
infotexts.entitydescription.derfreischutzovercoat: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent. Seven damages reduced to 70%.
infotexts.entitydescription.magicbullet: The weapon's bullets travel across the corridor, along the horizon. Each bullet has a 1 in 7 chance of being enhanced.
infotexts.entitydescription.magicbulletoutis: The weapon's bullets travel across the corridor, along the horizon. Striking enemies with the weapon's melee mode will enhance the next shot.
infotexts.entitydescription.meleebulletoutis: Each melee hit with this weapon adds one Magic Bullet to the user, up to 7. Each Magic Bullet increases the power of the rifle, but also increases the user's sanity drain on fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.exuviae: The slick sensation when holding this E.G.O may disturb some employees.
infotexts.entitydescription.warpmachete: A very sharp blade primarily issued to W Corp Cleanup Crews for rapid close quarters combat. Insert Enkephalin Module to activate Rupture function.
infotexts.entitydescription.warpknife: A small knife issued to W Corp Cleanup Crews for CQB and utility use. Its low cost makes it a valid backup weapon. Insert Enkephalin Module to activate Rupture function.
infotexts.entitydescription.warpglaive: A type of polearm with a one-sided blade on the end, primarily designed to grant the user an extended reach for their cuts. It's a common weapon for W Corp. Cleanup Crews given its overall utility and ease of use. Insert Enkephalin Module to activate Rupture function.
infotexts.entitydescription.warpaxe: An axe issued to W Corp. Cleanup Crews in case they need to breach locked doors, also makes for a pretty effective weapon too. Insert Enkephalin Module to activate Rupture function.
infotexts.entitydescription.enkephalinmodule: A module containing Enkephalin, an organic byproduct unique to Abnormalities. A label on the module reads: [NOTE] Utilizing a dosage of liquid Enkephalin allows for more stable usage compared to its gaseous form. The Enkephalin can be converted into energy by plugging the module into a designated socket. [CAUTION] Modularization of Enkephalin is an irreversible; the module may only be expended via a socket. Usage outside of intended purposes or modification is strictly forbidden.
infotexts.entitydescription.refinedenkephalinmodul: An overcharged Enkephalin module containing even more energy than its standard version.
infotexts.entitydescription.brokenenkephalinmodule: An empty Enkephalin module that can be safely deconstructed.
infotexts.entitydescription.talisman: These talismans... can impede movement. The more of them are attached... the more the curse piles up.
infotexts.entitydescription.alephguide: A guide to Abnormalities of the ALEPH Grade.
infotexts.entitydescription.blacksilencegloves: I have nothing but my sorrow and I want nothing more. It has been, it still is, faithful to me.
Why should I begrudge it, since during the hours when my soul crushed the depths of my heart, it was seated there beside me?
O sorrow, I have ended, you see, by respecting you, because I am certain you will never leave me.
Ah! I realize it: your beauty lies in the force of your being. You are like those who never left the sad fireside corner of my poor black heart.

O my sorrow, you are better than a well-beloved: because I know that on the day of my final agony, you will be there, lying in my sheets, O sorrow, so that you might once again attempt to enter my heart.
infotexts.entitydescription.fullstophandgun: A master-crafted handgun which feeds from 9x19mm Corporate magazines. It's highly reliable and does its job of putting rounds on target fairly well without slowing the user down.
infotexts.entitydescription.fullstoprifle: A unique rifle which uses both electromagnetic accelerators and chemical propellant to send its projectiles downrange at incredible velocities. The rifle is bulky and takes time to charge up before and cool down after shots, but it hits hard. It comes with a digital scope that needs a battery to function.
infotexts.entitydescription.9mmmag_corporate: A magazine loaded with 20 rounds of 9x19mm Corporate. These high-velocity rounds don't cause much bleeding, but they can pierce light armor and put dents in heavier armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.9mmmag_corporate_paral: A magazine loaded with 20 rounds of 9x19mm Corporate designed to Paralyze targets by delivering a small electric shock, enough to cause a muscle spasm and tire out targets. A prudent choice if you need to weaken a powerful enemy.
infotexts.entitydescription.fullstop_machete: This machete uses durable alloys and quality construction to keep a sharp edge, great for cutting through armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.answermeheishoupacks: Commands the Mao Branch to attack.
infotexts.entitydescription.likearoaringstorm: Commands the Mao Branch to attack multiple targets in front of you.
infotexts.entitydescription.bookofvengeance: The Middle Syndicate is known for its grudges. Every member of the Syndicate must carry one of these Books and record their grievances. (You can also slot this into an EGO Gift slot to gain [value]% more blunt damage.)
infotexts.entitydescription.dawnoffice_sword: A sword produced by Stigma Workshop, which specializes in weapons that burn the enemy. They're also known for the unique wavy patterns on their blades which are burned into the enemy as a calling card. Swings with this weapon lower your sanity while you have Indelible Stigma. Its parry isn't refreshed by augmented skill for some reason...
infotexts.entitydescription.waxenblade: Swings with this weapon lower your sanity while you have Indelible Stigma. Its parry is refreshed while in a Waxen Pinion state, extending the duration of Waxen Pinion and lowering Psychosis.
infotexts.entitydescription.egosplicer: A specialized device based on the gene splicer which facilitates the use of genetic material, EGO Gifts, body modifications, and enhancement tattoos. If you want to enhance your body modifications, insert Enkephalin to increase their condition.
infotexts.entitydescription.advancedegosplicer: A version of the Augment Splicer that can hold twice as many Gifts and Genes. If you want to enhance your body modifications, insert Enkephalin to increase their condition.
infotexts.entitydescription.advancedegosplicer_bom: A version of the Advanced Augment Splicer that detonates when you die, destroying your body.
infotexts.entitydescription.advancedegosplicer_del: A version of the Augment Splicer that destroys itself on death, denying the enemy any augments you had.
infotexts.fabricationdescription.qualitychange: An item of poor quality can be refined into a better version.
infotexts.fabricationdescription.vestigedark: Convert ZAYIN E.G.O. Gifts into Dark Vestiges.
infotexts.fabricationdescription.vestigefaint: Convert TETH E.G.O. Gifts into Faint Vestiges.
infotexts.fabricationdescription.vestigetwinkling: Convert HE E.G.O. Gifts into Twinkling Vestiges.
infotexts.fabricationdescription.vestigebrilliant: Convert WAW E.G.O. Gifts into Brilliant Vestiges.
infotexts.fabricationdescription.vestigelunar: Convert ALEPH E.G.O. Gifts into Lunar Vestiges.
infotexts.entitydescription.egofragment: A fragment of an Abnormality's E.G.O.
infotexts.entitydescription.vestige: A vestige of an Abnormality's E.G.O, formed from a Gift that was ground into dust.
infotexts.entityname.egofragment_onesin: E.G.O. Fragment: One Sin and a Hundred Good Deeds
infotexts.entityname.egofragment_talisman: E.G.O. Fragment: So That No One Will Cry
infotexts.entityname.egofragment_kinginbinds: E.G.O. Fragment: The King in Binds
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_venomousskin: When attacked, applies Tremor to the attacker. Increases damage resistance by [value]% and makes enemies prioritize you.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_punishingbeak: Increases movement and combat speed by [value]%, and repair speed by twice that value.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_whitegossypium: Converts stun on yourself and your enemies into bleeding. Increases bleed resistance by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_bloodsoakedgos: Converts stun on yourself and your enemies into bleeding, and converts bleeding into bloodloss on enemies. You recover from blood loss faster. Increases bleed resistance by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_oldwoodendoll: While you have Poise, inflict 2 Fragile with every hit. Increases accuracy by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_talismanbundle: Your attacks apply more Rupture. Increases resistance to rupture by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_nagel: 50% chance to inflict more Bleed with every attack. Increase ranged damage by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_hammer: 50% chance to inflict more Tremor and Stun with every attack. Increase melee damage by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_nagelundhammer: 50% chance to inflict more Bleed, Tremor and Stun with every attack. Increases melee and ranged damage by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_ncorpseal: Killing enemies grants you 10 Fanatic. Increases the amount of Fanatic you receive by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_bloodredmane: If you have't been attacked in 10 seconds, block 25% of the next attack's damage. Otherwise, deal 25% more damage. Increases movement speed by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_squalidity: Killing enemies grants you 10 Fanatic. If you haven't been attacked in 10 seconds, block 25% of the next attack's damage. Otherwise, deal 25% more damage. Increases movement speed by [value]%, and increases fanatic gains by [value]%x2.5.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_wholeness: Inflict 50% more Tremor, Stun, and Bleed. Inflict [value]% more damage with ranged and melee weapons. Gain [value]% more movement speed. Gain ([value]x2)% more Fanatic. If you have not been attacked in 10 seconds, resist 25% of the next attack's damage. Otherwise, deal 25% more damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_rupturedbloods: Your attacks inflict Blood Deluge, converting enemy bleeding into bloodloss. Recover from blood loss faster.
infotexts.entitydescription.pinpointlogiccircuit: Improves skill gain speed by [value]%, and EXP gains by half of that.
infotexts.entitydescription.sunshower: Your explosions gain [value]% more damage and radius, and you resist the effects of flowing water by ([value]x5)%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_pendantofnosta: Every 10 seconds, gain 3 Poise. Additionally, gain 0.[value] Poise/second for 3 seconds.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_killinpendant: A gift from a friend. Gain [value]% max health and immunity to abyssal damages.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_awe: When attacked, apply Bloodloss and Aggro to the attacker. Increases damage resistance by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_gazeofcontempt: When attacked, apply Bloodloss, Aggro, and Fragile to the attacker. Increases damage resistance by [value]%. When looting an enemy for the first time, there is a chance to find Enkephalin or a Vistage, but you have to attack them at least once before they die to claim the reward.
infotexts.entitydescription.perversion: When you loot a dead monster for the first time, there is a chance to find Enkephalin. You need to have attacked the monster at least one time prior to its death to claim this reward.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_arrestedhymn: If there are crew nearby, walk 25% slower but gain 50% increased maximum health. Increases walk speed by [value]% and swim speed by ([value]x2)%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_watchfuleye: Grants [value] meters of thermal vision (min 3) and heals physical injuries at a rate of ([value]x3)% per minute.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_censored: Selective sensory blocker. Grants [value]% resistance to Psychosis, Nausea, Disoriented, Blinded, Concussion, and Sensory Overload. Grants a creature attack which inflicts debuffs on the enemy and increases its damage by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_tattoo_middle_: Grants overall benefits to the wearer, including a bonus of [value] to Medical and Weapons skill, and [value]% to maximum health, movement speed, and melee attack power/speed.

Grants a plethora of powerful benefits to the wearer, including but not limited to a bonus of [value] to Medical and Weapons skill, and [value]% to movement speed, melee attack speed, and melee attack power. Also protects against pressure and going unconscious, and lets you move normally while dragging bodies.
infotexts.entitydescription.bodymod_grade9_general: Improves movement speed and repair stats by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.bodymod_grade9_offense: Improves melee speed/strength and ranged accuracy by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.bodymod_grade9_defense: Improves maximum health by [value]%. Improves flow resistance, breath holding time, and stun resistance by twice that value.
infotexts.entitydescription.bodymod_grade9_premium: Combines the statistics of General, Offense, and Defense body mods. (Duplicate stats do not stack.) (Deconstructs into its component Augments with no loss.)

infotexts.entitydescription.egogift_jingangbolus: When falling into a critical state, gain [value] temporary HP. (60 second cooldown)
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbuniform: A standard issue uniform for LCCB, a riot suppression team. It offers good protection against the many threats you may face in a riot and has plenty of pockets.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbbodyarmor: A ballistic vest designed primarily for use in riot scenarios.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbhelmetvisor: A riot helmet made to LCCB standards and fitted with a durable visor.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbhelmetlight: A riot helmet made to LCCB standards. The lack of accessories reduces its protective value, but makes it light enough not to impede the user at all.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbhelmetbalaclava: A riot helmet made to LCCB standards and fitted with a durable visor. A balaclava is included, improving resistance against chemical weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbhelmetmask: A riot helmet made to LCCB standards and fitted with a diving mask. When fitted with an oxygen supply, chemical warfare is a non-issue.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbshotgun: An LCCB-issued shotgun with a slightly above-average capacity and a specially tuned barrel for hard-hitting shots.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbhandgun: A handgun with twice the capacity of an ordinary revolver and an odd dual feed receiver allowing it to accept 9mm magazine as well. Its toughened frame allows it to make the most of Quake Rounds, but its kick asks a lot of the user.
infotexts.entitydescription.quakeround: A miniaturized shock emitter tuned to inflict Tremor on targets. Repeated shots will quickly build the effect. Round specification .38 Corporate.
infotexts.entitydescription.quakeroundmagazine: An LCCB-issued magazine which holds 12 Quake Rounds. Round specification 9x19mm Corporate.
infotexts.entitydescription.quakeroundmagazineext: An LCCB special issue extended magazine which holds 24 Quake Rounds. Round specification 9x19mm Corporate.
infotexts.entitydescription.quakeshell: A shotgun shell which delivers a disrupting payload to anyone unfortunate enough to be on the receiving end. Round specification 12 Gauge Corporate.
infotexts.entitydescription.lccbbaton: An LCCB-issued low-voltage baton tuned to a specific frequency that interacts with the Tremor phenomena and causes muscle paralysis.
infotexts.entitydescription.kcorpuniform: A uniform designed for K Corp's Class 1 security staff. It is particularly well-suited to search and rescue or riot suppression operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.kcorpbodyarmor: A ballistic vest and shoulder rig which provides above-par protection against environmental hazards.
infotexts.entitydescription.kcorphelmet: A helmet made for K Corp. Class 1 security units. It provides ample protection against environmental hazards like burns and radiation sickness and comes with an oxygen mask built in. Includes an auto-injector.
infotexts.entitydescription.kcorpaxe: A two handed axe made for K Corp. Class 1 security units which inflicts a small amount of Rupture or Fragile on hit. It has an added benefit of being able to hack through ballast flora and quickly break down doors to reach trapped crew.
infotexts.entitydescription.kcorpbaton: A K Corp. issued low-voltage baton with a similar mechanism to the LCCB Baton, although it trades Paralysis for more Tremor application.
infotexts.entitydescription.rabbituniform: An armored suit designed for R Corp's 4th Pack Rabbit Team which conducts Charge very efficiently. While the wearer has Charge, this suit will cause them to recover more quickly from stun effects. The suit also provides a power source for night vision mounted inside R Corp Helmets. Provides up to 4000m of pressure protection if the helmet is also worn.
infotexts.entitydescription.rabbithelmet: A helmet designed for R Corp's 4th Pack Rabbit Team. It features an autoinjector and an oxygen intake, allowing the wearer to operate in harsh conditions. While the wearer has Charge, a rebreather unit slowly refills contained oxygen tanks.
infotexts.entitydescription.rhinosuit: A massive suit of power armor designed for R Corp's 4th Pack Rhino Team. Requires a fuel rod to work, unless the wearer has Charge. If the wearer is helmeted, provides 6000m depth protection.
infotexts.entitydescription.rhinohelmet: A heavily armored helmet designed for R Corp's 4th Pack Rhino Team. It features an autoinjector and an oxygen intake, allowing the wearer to operate in harsh conditions. While the wearer has Charge, a rebreather unit slowly refills contained oxygen tanks.
infotexts.entitydescription.sweepermask_SO: An armored mask that is commonly worn by Sweepers to protect them from the elements. Inserted oxygen tanks will only consume oxygen when needed.
infotexts.entitydescription.sweepersuit_SO: An armored suit that is commonly worn by Sweepers to protect them from the elements. When a mask is also worn, this suit will provide pressure protection.
infotexts.entitydescription.sweeperhook_SO: An unorthodox hooked weapon which can inflict acid burns on targets and absorb corpses to heal Sweepers.
infotexts.missiondescription.headlessichthys: A Headless Ichthys has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can neutralize it.
infotexts.missionsuccess.headlessichthys: The Headless Ichthys has been suppressed.
infotexts.missionmessage0.headlessichthys: Headless Ichthys has been suppressed. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostabnor: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that hostile Abnormalities built a nest inside it. Find any Abnormalities inside the outpost and suppress them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostabnormali: The Abnormalities inside the outpost have been successfully suppressed.
infotexts.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostabnormali: The outpost remains overrun with Abnormalities.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostabnormal: The Abnormality inside the outpost has been successfully suppressed. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostabnor: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that multiple Abnormalities have breached containment. Find any Abnormalities inside the outpost and suppress them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostabnormali: The Abnormalities inside the outpost have been successfully suppressed.
infotexts.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostabnormali: The outpost remains overrun with Abnormalities.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostabnormal: The Abnormalities inside the outpost have been successfully suppressed. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostordea: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that an Ordeal has occurred. Find any Amber entities inside the outpost and suppress them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostordealamb: We ate endlessly to live. Inevitable depletion, garbage...
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostordealam: The Ordeal inside the outpost has been successfully suppressed. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotexts.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostordea: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that an Ordeal has occurred. Find any Amber entities inside the outpost and suppress them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostordealamb: We were able to live. We could continue eating.
infotexts.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostordealamb: To accustom oneself to the taste was an inevitable process.
infotexts.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostordealam: The Ordeal inside the outpost has been successfully suppressed. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pale.self.low: There is a dull ache in your chest, although it doesn't seem physically present. Painkillers don't numb the pain. You find yourself struggling a bit more when trying to move your body, like you're becoming disconnected.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pale.low: The patient reports pain, but you can't find any physical damage. Their movements seem sluggish and fatigued.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pale.self: Your limbs are weak and struggle to move. The very essence of your life is being destroyed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pale: The patient is extremely sluggish, bordering on unconsciousness. It's clear something is very wrong with them, but you can't see what it is.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pale.severe: Let us meet again as stars.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.poise: You have a 5% chance per Poise to Critically Hit. (Registered in increments of 5%)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ishallleadtheway: When you lose sight of your path, when you no longer know which road to take... The guide shall show you the way.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bloodbarrier: A barrier of blood protects from harm.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.superthermogenesis: Take fixed damage that decreases by itself over time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bluestarpulse.self: As you descend into psychosis, you can't help but sense the Blue Star's ambiance in the back of your mind.
Although you despair at the state of the world, Blue Star promises hope. If you can only join it...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bluestarpulse: It's too late for the patient now. They have succumbed to the Blue Star's influence.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bluestarpulse.seve: Let us meet again as stars.
You took quite the hit back there, it's a surprise you're still on your feet.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.abno_stagger.low: The patient's balance seems a bit off and their legs are shaky.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.abno_stagger: The patient looks like they're about to fall over.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.couriertrunk.1: Devyat Courier Trunks emanate energy that can empower the wielder, but an excess of this power can be dangerous. No current effect.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.couriertrunk.3: Improved attack potency. Approaching upper safety threshold.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.couriertrunk.4: WARNING: Benefits maximized, safety threshold exceeded! Leave combat ASAP!
infotexts.alephguide:
Guide to Aleph Abnormalities

Nothing There

A giant mass of flesh. Cuts victims down while healing.
Use extreme force. Do not let up and do not let the Abnormality have any breathing room

Drops Mimicry E.G.O. on death

Blue Star

Causes extreme sanity loss upon contact with it
Do not submit to madness or you will become one with the star.

CENSORED

Dangerous. Can (CENSORED) to (CENSORED) with humans and husks to create different (CENSORED) pawns.
Keep your distance from (CENSORED) and its children. Do not let them close the gap or they will (CENSORED) your (CENSORED).
infotexts.faction.middle.description: The Middle has an extremely tight-knit 'familial' structure, and Syndicate members share close fraternal ties with each other; members of the Middle call each other "Brothers" and "Sisters", and rank in the group is denoted by seniority in the family. The emphasis on family is more than superficial: parties are thrown for new members, and large group dinners are often held, which family members are expected to attend. The Middle has a completely different attitude towards outsiders. Any slight (or "sin", as members call them) done to a member of the Middle or its property (including assets and subservient Syndicates) will be recorded on the "Book of Vengeance" (which members carry around on their waists), and promptly avenged for, usually within the space of a few days.
infotexts.faction.middle.shortdescription: The Middle has an extremely tight-knit 'familial' structure, but they have no forgiveness for any 'slights' caused by outsiders.
infotexts.faction.ring.description: Out of the Five Fingers, the Ring are notorious for their very literal human exhibitions — constructing galleries of art made from other people and even themselves. They value self-expression but pursue gruesome forms of art dedicated to depicting human suffering by perpetuating it.
infotexts.faction.ring.shortdescription: The creed and calling that the Ring lies in the creation of "art".
infotexts.faction.thumb.description: Of the Fingers, the Thumb is as known for its class and formality as it is feared for its fanatical devotion to hierarchy. Acting against or even questioning a superior is an offense to be punished with blood, and not even outsiders are exempt from these rules.
infotexts.faction.thumb.shortdescription: Of the Fingers, the Thumb is as known for its class and formality as it is feared for its fanatical devotion to hierarchy.
infotexts.jobdescription.oasisnugget: Welcome to your job at Lobotomy Corporation.
infotexts.jobdescription.lobcorpremnant: Welcome to your job at Lobotomy Corporation.
infotexts.jobdescription.kromer: Bearing the title of The One Who Grips, Kromer leads N Corp. with an iron fist and seeks to purify that which is inhuman.
infotexts.jobdescription.ncorpkleinhammer: N Corp's Inquisitors are fiercely loyal to Kromer and their decrees, following an almost religious doctrine.
infotexts.jobdescription.ncorpmittelhammer1: N Corp's Inquisitors are fiercely loyal to Kromer and their decrees, following an almost religious doctrine.
infotexts.jobdescription.ncorpmittelhammer2: N Corp's Inquisitors are fiercely loyal to Kromer and their decrees, following an almost religious doctrine.
infotexts.jobdescription.ncorpgroshamemr: Here is the hammer of the One who Grips.
infotexts.jobdescription.middle: Little Siblings of the Middle care about their 'family' above all else, that family being the Middle. They'll gladly punish anyone who slights one of their family members.
infotexts.jobdescription.rcorprabbit: Rabbits are elite soldiers employed by R Corp. No expense is spared when training R Corp troops.
infotexts.jobdescription.rcorprhino: Rhinos are the demolitionists of R Corp.
infotexts.jobdescription.rcorpreindeer: Reindeer convert their own brainwaves into energy to inflict psychic damage against their enemies. Unfortunately, this often drives them insane.
infotexts.jobdescription.ringstudent: Out of the Five Fingers, the Ring are notorious for their very literal human exhibitions — constructing galleries of art made from other people and even themselves. They value self-expression but pursue gruesome forms of art dedicated to depicting human suffering by perpetuating it.
infotexts.jobdescription.wcorpcleanupcrew: The WARP Cleanup Crew are employees of WARP Corp. who were originally hired for clandestine cleanup jobs, but now they help with a wide variety of jobs everywhere.
infotexts.jobname.wcorpcleanupcrew_cca: W Corp. L4 Cleanup Agent: CCA
infotexts.jobdescription.wcorpcleanupcrew_cca: The WARP Cleanup Crew are employees of WARP Corp. who were originally hired for clandestine cleanup jobs, but now they help with a wide variety of jobs everywhere.
infotexts.jobdescription.arbiter: Arbiters may be cocky, but when they get serious, there's little to nothing that can stand in their way. Unfortunately, you only have access to the degraded version of their gear.
infotexts.jobdescription.claw: Claws are the great Executioners of the Head. Unfortunately, you only have access to the degraded version of their gear.
infotexts.jobdescription.wildhunt: Ride to your death, O Dullahan!
infotexts.jobdescription.redmist: Bait used to be- holy shit is that the Red Mist?
infotexts.jobdescription.sevenassociation: The Seven Association specializes in investigation, and can be described most similarly to detectives or private investigators. However, they will also actively solve the problems they are contracted to investigate, such as executing the criminal behind a murder. As Seven Association's main form of trade involves information gathering, its Fixers are valued for their discretion and observation skills, and during missions, they are recommended to not rush into combat. An equally important part of their job consists of post-contract management, during which they compile reports on the case and describe the information gathered.
infotexts.jobdescription.sweeper: Sweepers are genetically modified individuals who wear their own special suits and wield their own special weapons. The more they attune with their suit, the less human they become.
infotexts.jobdescription.heishoupack: A Hare of the Heishou Pack's Mao Branch. Your names are all falsified, and you don't know your fellow Hares. You simply do as you are told.
infotexts.jobdescription.zilu: An Adept Hare of the Heishou Pack's Mao Branch.
infotexts.jobdescription.heishoupack_sibranch: A Snake of the Heishou Pack's Si Branch.
infotexts.jobdescription.fullstopoffice: An Office that specializes in mowing down hordes of weak enemies using firearms.
infotexts.jobdescription.heishoupack_youbranch: A Rooster of the Heishou Pack's You Branch. All you care about is the next battle, it's all that brings you joy in life.
infotexts.jobdescription.heishoupack_wubranch: A Horse of the Heishou Pack's Wu Branch. You are the cavalry, the linebreaker.
infotexts.jobdescription.firefistoffice: Fixers of Firefist Office, hailing from the district of P. Corp, wear red pinstripe suits, carry a tank of fuel on their back, and fight with a power gauntlet with an attached flamethrower, giving them their eponymous Firefist name.
infotexts.jobdescription.shi_east: The Shi specialize in covert assassination requests.
infotexts.jobdescription.ncorpfellbullet: They would point and jeer at the rags splattered with the blood of fellowship. The fools; only I can grasp the highest degree of tragedy upon this earth.
infotexts.jobdescription.ncorpcontemptawe: Why don't you just die standing up? The freshness of your hideous gaze is decaying by the second.
infotexts.jobdescription.indexproselyte: My own will is erroneous. Only the Prescript can lead me to the right path.
infotexts.jobdescription.dawnoffice: Dawn Office is a small but wealthy Grade 4 Office and an associate Office of the Liu Association. Run by Salvador, a veteran Fixer, the Office is located in V Corp.
infotexts.jobdescription.tcorpclass2: The T Corp. Time Collections Agency is responsible for gathering taxes paid in Time, literally.
infotexts.jobdescription.tcorpclass3: Higher level Time Tax Collectors are deployed to handle higher-profile targets, such as wealthy tax evaders.
infotexts.jobdescription.tcorpvdcu: The Violent Defaulter Collections Unit specializes in taking down organized crime related to T Corp and Time, such as Time Traffickers who literally steal Time from T Corp's vaults.
infotexts.jobdescription.nightawls: The Night Awls were a subsidiary of the Thumb that carried out its Purges, only to be Purged as well after their Captain made a grave mistake.
infotexts.jobdescription.hanafuda: Whenever a game happens with something at stake, a go-between needs to be there to prove that the results were legitimate.
infotexts.jobdescription.devyat: The Devyat' Association is one of the twelve Associations of the City, made up of Fixers specializing in the delivery of objects.
infotexts.jobdescription.zweisouth: The Zwei Association specializes in protection contracts.
infotexts.jobdescription.bloodfiendmanager: To become a Bloodfiend means to be infected with an illness, afflicted with an enormous thirst that can only be sated by feeding on fresh, flowing blood.
infotexts.jobdescription.bloodfiendPrince: To become a Bloodfiend means to be infected with an illness, afflicted with an enormous thirst that can only be sated by feeding on fresh, flowing blood.
infotexts.jobdescription.bloodfiendBarber: To become a Bloodfiend means to be infected with an illness, afflicted with an enormous thirst that can only be sated by feeding on fresh, flowing blood.
infotexts.jobdescription.bloodfiendPriest: To become a Bloodfiend means to be infected with an illness, afflicted with an enormous thirst that can only be sated by feeding on fresh, flowing blood.
infotexts.jobdescription.bloodfiendbarberfollower: To become a Bloodfiend means to be infected with an illness, afflicted with an enormous thirst that can only be sated by feeding on fresh, flowing blood.
infotexts.jobdescription.bloodfiendpriestfollower: To become a Bloodfiend means to be infected with an illness, afflicted with an enormous thirst that can only be sated by feeding on fresh, flowing blood.
infotexts.talenttree.head: Head
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiter: An unparalleled force of nature. When 'killed', Retreat from battle instead of dying.
infotexts.talentdescription.youarenothing: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker loses sanity.
infotexts.talentdescription.counter: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker receives a small amount of damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.cannedknowledge: All Inquisitors gain +[skills] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.inquisition: In the name of the One Who Grips.
infotexts.talentdescription.hammer: On every attack, you have a [chance]% chance to deal [amount]% more Stun and Tremor.
infotexts.talentdescription.nagel: On every attack, you have a [chance]% chance to deal [amount]% more Bleeding and Nails.
infotexts.talentdescription.ncorpseal: When you kill an enemy, gain [gainamount] Fanatic. Gain [amount]% more Fanatic from all sources.
infotexts.talentdescription.bloodredmane: If you have not been attacked in [seconds] seconds, resist the next attack by [amount]%. After you are hit, you receive a [damageamount]% bonus to all damage for 10 seconds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bloodredmane_talen: The next hit you suffer will deal 50% less damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.wholeness: Gain [amount]% resistance to most alien diseases, illnesses, and drug side effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.infirmretribution: Deal [amount]% more damage. Additionally, deal [blunt]% more blunt damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.drive: Gain [stundefense]% resistance to stun. On every melee hit, reduce stun on self by [stunreduction] and reduce incremental stuns by [amount].
infotexts.talentdescription.zealouspurge: Inflict [amount] Nails and Paralyze on melee hit.
infotexts.talentdescription.joyofexecution: Gain [amount] Hyperactivity and Vigor on kill.
infotexts.talentdescription.ironcladretribution: Gain a [fanaticdamage]% damage bonus while Fanatic. Deal [amount]% more damage for every nearby ally, up to [maxamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.rightfulpurge: Inflict [meleeamount] Tremor on melee hit and [amount] on hits with the Nailgun.
infotexts.talentdescription.fanaticaljudgement: If the target has [nailed]+ Nails, inflict [amount] Offense Down and [paralyze] Paralyze with Mittelhammer hits.
infotexts.talentdescription.youarecleansedofsin: If the target has [nailed]+ Nails, inflict [amount] Offense Down and [slow] slow with hits from Groshammer weapons.
infotexts.talentdescription.annihilateheretics: If the target has [nailed]+ Nails, heal a small amount with hits from Groshammer weapons.
infotexts.talentdescription.foolishness: Additionally, gain [amount] Defense Up. While in a critical state, also gain Offense Up.
infotexts.talentdescription.obsessivehammer: Never go unconscious. When entering a critical state, gain max Offense and Defense Up as well as Fanatic, and remove all debuffs and bleeding effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.littlevengeance: You won't let any transgression slide. When hit, inflict Mark of Vengeance on whoever hit you. Whenever a member of the Middle hits someone with a Mark of Vengeance, they deal increased damage and apply more effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.chainsofloyalty: You look out for your siblings in the Middle. Grants Vigor, up to [strength], to allies within [range] meters. Does not apply to yourself, but if someone else has this talent, you will receive twice as much Vigor.
infotexts.talentdescription.multifoldretribution: The only way to erase a name from the Book of Vengeance is death. Increases Paralysis damage by [paralysisamount]%, and Bleeding and Blunt damage by [damageamount]%. Deal [damageamount]% more damage to enemies with Mark of Vengeance.
infotexts.talentdescription.seizeyachance: Gain immunity to Stun. Once every [seconds] seconds, when you're hit, stay conscious regardless of your health state for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.vengeanceawaitsyouall: Under [health]% of your health, deal [damage]% more damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.seizeyachance: Gain immunity to Stun. Once every [seconds] seconds, when you're hit, stay conscious regardless of your health state for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.rightinthedome: When attacking targets with Vengeance Mark, each hit has a [chance]% to inflict [amount] Sensory Overload. Above [threshold] Sensory Overload, Disorient them.
infotexts.talentdescription.gutcrush: When attacking targets with Vengeance Mark, each hit has a [chance]% to inflict [amount] Nausea, disorienting them. Above [threshold] Nausea, apply [stunamount] Stagger with each hit.
infotexts.talentdescription.aimforthesolarplexus: Apply [amount] Paralyze with each hit. If the target has more than [paralyze] Paralyze, apply [slow] Slow.
infotexts.talentdescription.youngbrother: Gain [amount]% melee damage and speed. Remove dual wielding penalties entirely.
infotexts.talentdescription.bigbrother: Gain [amount]% melee damage and speed. Remove dual wielding penalties entirely.
infotexts.talentdescription.greatbrother: Gain [amount]% melee damage and speed. Remove dual wielding penalties entirely.
infotexts.talentdescription.ridiculousgrit: Gain [burnresistance]% resistance to Burn. Seize ya Chance grants a [amount]% chance to gain Ridiculous Grit for one second whenever you're hit, if you don't have Salvation Cooldown. Always remain conscious; when falling into critical condition, gain [damageresistance]% damage resistance for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.steelknuckles: Deal [amount]% more stun and blunt damage to foes.
infotexts.talentdescription.focusfire: To all allies within [range] meters: Increase accuracy by [spread]% and fire rate by [reload]%. Other allies with this buff will be able to grant it to you.
infotexts.talentdescription.summaryjudgement: Upon shooting an unconscious person with rifle ammo, instantly kill them. Deal [amount]% more damage with Soldato ammunition damage types and [amount]% more damage with rifle ammo.
infotexts.talentdescription.ferrousguard: Take [amount]% less physical damage and [stunamount]% less stun. When hit, retaliate with a small melee counterattack.
infotexts.talentdescription.concentration: Shoot with [accuracy]% less spread and deal [damage]% more damage if you have not fired your weapon in [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.capo: Gain [amount]% max hitpoints. Remove dual wielding penalties entirely.
infotexts.talentdescription.tanglecleaver: While crouched and aiming the Tiantui Star Blade, gain stacks of Tanglecleaver. Tanglecleaver increases melee damage by up to [amount]% at its maximum stack of [duration]. Tanglecleaver is reduced by 1 every time you attack or every time a second passes.
infotexts.talentname.savagetigerslayersperfectedfl: Savage Tigerslayer's Perfected Flurry of Blades
infotexts.talentdescription.savagetigerslayersperf: While in a critical state, hits with the Tiantui Star Blade grant 1 stack of Savage Tigerslayer. Savage Tigerslayer increases melee damage by up to [amount]% at its maximum stack of [maxstacks]. Attacking while at max stacks will remove all stacks and activate a [cooldown] second cooldown.
infotexts.talentdescription.badmanners: Those who attack you are inflicted with the Bad Manners debuff for [seconds] seconds, reducing their movement speed and attack potency by [amount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.propelledblade: Move [amount]% faster when aiming the Tiantui Star Blade.
infotexts.talentdescription.shove: Inflict [amount] Paralyze on hit with a melee weapon.
infotexts.talentdescription.suppress: Inflict [amount] Rupture when hitting with Quake Rounds.
infotexts.talentdescription.bythemanual: Allies within [distance] meters gain up to [amount] RED Shield.
infotexts.talentdescription.guard: Every [seconds] seconds, reduce the damage of an incoming attack by [amount]% and gain [aggroamount] Aggro, drawing enemy attention.
infotexts.talentdescription.oof1: Your hits with Quake Shells burst Tremor.
infotexts.talentdescription.oof2: Inflict [amount] Rupture with Quake Shell hits.
infotexts.talentdescription.breaching: If you haven't attacked in [seconds] seconds, inflict [amount]% more damage with your next ranged weapon hit.
infotexts.talentdescription.hpampule: Never fall unconscious. Additionally, every time you are hit, receive [amount] Combat Stimulant. (Once per second.)
infotexts.talentdescription.decayampule: Your hits with K Corp issued melee weapons inflict [amount] Rupture. Does not apply to stun weapons. Additionally, inflict [damageamount]% more Rupture and Fragile.
infotexts.talentdescription.excise: Your hits with K Corp issued melee weapons inflict [amount] Rupture. Does not apply to stun weapons. Additionally, if you are above 80% HP, deal [damageamount]% more damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.suspiciousindividuals: All of your melee hits inflict [amount] Incremental Stun.
infotexts.talentdescription.notrespassing: Inflict [amount] Fragile with hits using non-stun K Corp melee weapons.
infotexts.talentdescription.restrain: All of your melee hits slow targets by [amount]% for [seconds] seconds. This effect can stack.
infotexts.talentdescription.overloadedhpampule: When falling into a critical state while wearing the K Corp Class 3 Excision suit, immediately heal to full HP. If you do this [amount] or more times within a relatively short time, you will instantly die.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiter_suspiciousindi: All of your hits inflict [amount] Incremental Stun.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiter_restrain: All of your hits slow targets by [amount]% for [seconds] seconds. This effect can stack.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiter_overloadedhpam: If you haven't taken damage in [amount] seconds, passively regenerate your injuries.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiter_shove: Inflict [amount] Paralyze on hit with any weapon.
infotexts.talentdescription.safetylock: Deal [amount]% less damage to humans and friendly units.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiterchain: Apply [amount] Paralyze and Slow to targets with Arbiter powers. (Does not affect Fairy or Lock Beams)
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiterfairy: Apply [amount] Fairy to targets with any attack.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbiterpillar: Deal [amount]% more damage with all attacks for every nearby enemy, up to [maxamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.arbitershockwave: Deal no damage to Claws and Arbiters. Deal [amount]% more damage otherwise. (Does not affect Fairy or Lock Beams)
infotexts.talentdescription.grazethegrass: Hits with the Rabbit Knife grant [amount] Charge. While you have any Charge, your movement speed and damage output is increased by [dmgamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.concentratedfire: Increases your accuracy by [accuracy]%. Improves ranged weapon fire rate by [firespeed]%. All of your hits inflict [amount]% more bleeding.

infotexts.talentdescription.rabbitevade: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and you gain [charge] Charge.
infotexts.talentdescription.rabbitprotocol: Rabbits within 6 meters gain the following benefits:
infotexts.talentdescription.rabbitaugmentation: As your health drops, gain more movement speed, up to [speed]% while in critical condition.

infotexts.talentdescription.groundcrash: Increases the damage of the Rhino Warhammer's ultimate ability by [amount]% and allows the hammer to burst Tremor. While over [charge] Charge, it drains half as slowly. While over [charge2] Charge, this bonus is increased to [drainreduction]% slower drain.

infotexts.talentdescription.paintover: With every hit with a Ring Paintbrush, roll chances to inflict random damage types. Each damage type has a [chance]% chance to be applied with a strength of [value].
infotexts.talentdescription.sanguinepainting: Inflict [amount]% more Bleeding. Every unique damage type present on the target will also grant a [chance]% chance to apply [bleedamount] Bleeding each when you attack with a Ring Paintbrush.

infotexts.talentdescription.multitudeofdots: After hitting a target with the Pointillist Paintbrush, periodically inflict random damage types on them over time.
infotexts.talentdescription.assignmentevaluation: Upon hitting a target, recover [amount] Sanity and reduce Husk Infection by [amount]%. Additionally, gain [vigoramount] Vigor and Combat Stimulant.
infotexts.talentdescription.artworkinspection: Deal [amount]% more damage with the Pointillist Paintbrush for every negative effect on a target, max. [finalamount]%. If you kill a target, apply [vigoramount] Offense Up to yourself and nearby allies.

infotexts.talentdescription.focusspirit: With sufficient focus, you can overcome anything with one well placed strike. Gain an escalating bonus to damage resistance and melee weapon power, up to [damage]%, as long as you are not attacking. The maximum bonus is reached after [seconds] seconds.

infotexts.talentdescription.upstandingslash: With every hit, you adapt to your enemy and learn how to overpower them. Every hit will grant a [damage]% bonus, up to [maxdamage]%, lasting a maximum of [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.levelslash: With every hit, you adapt to your enemy and move quicker to avoid their blows. Every hit will grant a [damage]% bonus, up to [maxdamage]%, lasting a maximum of [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.onrush: Killing one opponent makes an opening to take out another. After killing a target, gain a [attack]% bonus to melee speed and damage, lasting [seconds] seconds.

infotexts.talentdescription.targetaim: Hold your aim to charge up your next attack. Grants a [amount]% bow damage bonus for every second, up to a maximum of [maxamount]%. After attack, gain Poise equal to stack, and lose all stacks.
infotexts.talentdescription.bowsglimmer: Deal [amount]% more damage against targets that have neither attacked you or received damage from your attacks for [seconds] seconds. [cooldown] second cooldown.
infotexts.talentdescription.shinoyumi: If you haven't attacked or been attacked in [seconds] seconds, enemies will ignore you.
infotexts.talentdescription.targetreadjustmentfire: When hitting an enemy at 7 Torn Memory, deal bonus damage. When hitting an ally, trigger a series of AoE gunshots instead. If the target dies shortly after your attack, another series of AoE gunshots will go off. Killing an ally will always trigger the AoE gunshots. When hitting an ally with the 'Contempt of the Gaze' effect from N Corp EGO: Contempt, Awe, always trigger AoE gunshots, but without damaging the ally.
infotexts.talentdescription.ishallfireanytime: When hitting an ally with the 'Contempt of the Gaze' effect from N Corp EGO: Contempt, Awe, ‖color:gui.orange‖always trigger AoE gunshots,‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖but deal reduced damage to the ally.‖end‖
infotexts.talentname.cascadinggazeofaweunderneathc: Cascading Gaze of Awe Underneath Contempt
infotexts.talentdescription.cascadinggazeofaweunde: On hit with N Corp. EGO: Contempt, Awe, inflict 1 Gaze. When hit, inflict 1 Gaze on your attacker. Targets with Gaze deal and take 5% more damage to and from you per stack, up to a maximum of 7 stacks. The effect will persist at 7 stacks for 10 seconds (with a visual cue) before converting into Grasp. Grasp reduces the damage the target takes and deals from and to you by 50% for 10 seconds, before converting back into 6 Gaze. If the target has not received Gaze or Contempt for 30 seconds, the effect expires completely. When hitting targets at 7 Gaze or with Contempt using N Corp EGO: Contempt, Awe's sword form, deal a massive burst of damage and consume all Gaze or Contempt on the target, then gain 3.5 Gaze of Contempt. Deal 7% more damage for every stack. After 10 seconds at max stacks, Gaze of Contempt converts into Contempt of the Gaze, decreasing your damage dealt and taken by 50% for 10 seconds, then expires completely.
infotexts.talentdescription.graspthatforbidsfallin: When falling into a critical state, gain Contempt of the Gaze and [amount] Defense Up. ([cooldown] minute cooldown). While you have Defense Up, don't fall unconscious, and gain pressure and stun immunity.
infotexts.talentdescription.graceoftheprescript: Every [seconds] seconds, gain a [amount]% boost to either melee or ranged attacks for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.abno_execute: Repeatedly attacking a target grants a bonus of [amount]% damage, stacking up to [maxamount] times. This bonus lasts [seconds] seconds, only [cooldown] stacks can be gained per second, and the effect expires if you attack a different target. Targets remain marked for [marktime] seconds after you hit them.
infotexts.talentdescription.burningpassion: Deal up to [amount]% more melee damage based on how much Waxen Pinion is remaining.
infotexts.talentdescription.unstableshell: While you have Waxen Pinion, attack up to [amount]% faster based on how much Psychosis you have.
infotexts.talentdescription.sunsetblade: While you have Waxen Pinion, lose [amount] Psychosis on a successful hit.
infotexts.talentdescription.stigmatize: While you don't have Waxen Pinion, gain [amount] Psychosis on a successful hit.
infotexts.talentdescription.fiercecharge: Move up to [amount]% faster based on how much Waxen Pinion is remaining.
infotexts.talentdescription.feathershield: While in a Waxen Pinion state, parrying melee attacks causes you to take [powerreduction]% less damage and inflicts [amount] Burning on enemies.
infotexts.talentdescription.rue: When hit, gain [amount] Offense and Defense Up.
infotexts.talentdescription.blazingstrike: While in a high Waxen Pinion state, hits on enemies with high Burning will apply and trigger max Tremor: Scorch on them, but will also apply [amount] Psychosis on self and lower the remaining Waxen Pinion by [amount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.ruefuleventide: While you have high Psychosis and are wearing the Dawn Office Fixer uniform, enter the Waxen Pinion state automatically without needing an E.G.O. Stabilizer. Don't go unconscious and gain stun immunity.

infotexts.talentdescription.tidehunt: Deal [amount]% more damage against enemies with max Cold and gain [offup] Offense Up after hitting them.
infotexts.talentname.slaytheocean: Slay the Ocean, Slay the Ocean!!
infotexts.talentdescription.slaytheocean: Deal [amount]% more damage for every nearby enemy, up to [maxamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.abno_racism: Deal an additional [amount]% damage to nonhumans.
infotexts.talentdescription.preparetocollect: Absorb Time from targets based on which T Corp melee weapon you use. (Excludes the chainsaw).
infotexts.talentdescription.tcorpmartialsuppressio: Inflict [amount] Slow and [tremor] Tremor on targets with the T Corp Exoskeleton Gauntlets.
infotexts.talentdescription.executecollections: While in an Accelerated Time state, inflict Time Moratorium on targets, absorbing all damage on their body and inflicting it back as internal damage after a delay.
infotexts.talentdescription.goldentimeamputator: Always take [amount2]% less damage from targets with Time Moratorium. When dropping into crit, instantly heal all stun and [amount] Damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.tcorpacceleratedamputa: Deal [amount]% more damage with the T Corp Chainsaw and apply up to [slow] Slow and [tremor] Tremor per second with the weapon.
infotexts.talentdescription.icommandtheehalt: While in an Accelerated Time state, convert enemy Tremor into Tremor - Chain. Absorb twice as much time with the T Corp Pickaxe.
infotexts.talentdescription.goldentimeextracting: Always attract enemy attention while in an Accelerated Time state. When dropping into crit, instantly heal all stun and [amount] Damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.tcorpmicrocavitymodule: While in an Accelerated Time state, convert enemy Tremor into Tremor - Chain. Absorb twice as much time with the T Corp Mace.

infotexts.talentdescription.gapattack: Inflict 1 Open Wound on hit, which lasts for 10 seconds unless refreshed and slows the target. At 3 stacks, Open Wound becomes Deep Wound, which lasts 10 seconds as well and has a stronger slow but cannot be refreshed until it runs out. Triggering Tremor Burst while the enemy has Deep Wound will inflict Bleeding on them.

At 90+ Tremor: Hemorrhage on the target, trigger Tremor Burst and convert Deep Wound (if present) into Fatal Wound, which amplifies all its effects. At less than 90 Tremor: Hemorrhage, or if Deep Wound is not present, instead inflict 50% more Open Wound.

infotexts.talentdescription.bloodfeast: Allows you to gain Bloodfeast from nearby bleeding targets as long as a Bloodfeasting individual has hit them recently. Gain [amount] Bloodfeast on kill.
